titlestmt.subtitle: Papers of Thomas Stearnes Eliot and Orlo Williams at the Lilly Library, Indiana University, Bloomington, Indiana
titlestmt.author: Electronic finding aid encoded by Indiana University Libraries.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-02-18 22:23:41 -0500.

change.item: Edits and rearrangement of content to create sections for abstract, bioghist, controlaccess, scopecontent, acquisitioninfo, related materials, and levels for container list were applied. Madison Chartier
Batch update to change subject links.

did.abstract: The Williams, Orlo mss., 1924-1952, are letters to Orlo Williams, 1883-1967, author, from Thomas Stearnes Eliot, 1888-1965, poet.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.
Many collections are housed offsite; retrieval requires advance notice. Please make an appointment a minimum of one week in advance of your visit.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Orlo Williams, 1883-1967, was an author, essayist, and literary critic.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The Williams, Orlo mss., 1924-1952, are letters to Orlo Williams, 1883-1967, author, from Thomas Stearnes Eliot, 1888-1965, poet.

userestrict.head: Usage Restrictions
userestrict.p: Photography and digitization may be restricted for some collections. Copyright restrictions may apply. Before publishing, researchers are responsible for securing permission from all applicable rights holders, then filling out the Permission to Publish form.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item], Williams, Orlo mss., Lilly Library, Indiana University, Bloomington, Indiana.
